descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Discover the Ultimate Pickleball Experience and More!
- Unleash your creativity and fitness with our configurable custom physics engine. Whether you're aiming for precision, training for excellence, or just having fun, our platform has it all, with **9** sports and **27** environments to explore.
[media]
# Key Features:
- AI-Powered Pickleball: Experience outrageous rallies and exciting gameplay with our advanced AI Bots and **Multiplayer** for Singles and Doubles, with **instant replay**.
[media]
- Realistic Gameplay: Use your real-life forehand, backhand, dinks, and volleys to enhance your skills with **custom grip** adapters.
- Ambidextrous Play: Perfect for left, right-handed and ambidextrous players.
- **Single controller play** for double handed shots.
- **Ball machine with custom shot editor**: Take on several drills with ball machine. 
[media]
- **Practice Wall & Mirror mode**: Hone your skills with endless practice. Challenge yourself with different perspectives.
[media]
- **Over 50 leaderboards**: ranked daily, weekly, and all-time scores.
- Configurable Settings: Display fault trajectory, ball trail, etc.
# Multiplayer:
- Cross play between Quest and PSVR2
- Skill-based **matchmaking** worldwide.
- Create courts for pickup games.

# Fitness Tracker:
- Keeps a 7-day history of balls hit and minutes played

# Eight unlockable sports:
- Padel
- Badminton
- Baseball
- Cricket
- Zombies First Person Shooter
- Racquetball
- Paddleball
- Handball
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Support:
- https://www.facebook.com/groups/vrpickleball/
- https://discord.gg/gHZCUSPuRE
- Email: viniotstudios@gmail.com

# Key Features:
- AI-Powered Pickleball: Experience outrageous rallies and exciting gameplay with our advanced AI Bots and **Multiplayer** for Singles and Doubles, with **instant replay**.

- **Over 50 leaderboards**: ranked daily, weekly, and all-time scores.

# Multiplayer:
- Cross play between Quest and PSVR2
- Skill-based **matchmaking** worldwide.

# Fitness Tracker:
